title: Chrome packs not working in Team Builder
body: I bought the Darius Forge chroma pack and selected the Dark iron color during the pre-game lobby, and as soon as it hit the loading screen, it threw me into the game with the default skin, default colors. I thought maybe I didn't have it selected right before the game started so I tried again, and the same thing happened. I made sure to constantly keep selecting the skin until the game started and still started me with default colors. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
Hey Thy Reaver,

Thanks for the report! 

We're aware of an issue where Team Builder isn't accepting chromas sometimes, and we're currently investigating. 

Was this right after you purchased the chroma pack? Did you log back out and log back in before using the chroma pack? Any additional information you can provide would be great. Thank you! ^-^
